trans-unit.source: Represents the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 代表波斯曆。

trans-unit.source: The Persian calendar is used in most countries where Persian is spoken, although some regions use different month names.
trans-unit.target: 雖然某些區域使用不同的月份名稱大部分的國家/地區講波斯，使用波斯曆。

trans-unit.source: The Persian calendar is the official calendar of Iran and Afghanistan, and it is one of the alternative calendars in regions such as Kazakhstan and Tajikistan.
trans-unit.target: 波斯曆已正式的行事曆伊朗和阿富汗，而其中一個替代的行事曆塔吉克哈薩克等區域中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For information about using the PersianCalendar class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 使用 PersianCalendar 類別和其他行事曆類別的.NET Framework 相關資訊，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dates in the Persian calendar start from the year of the Hijra, which corresponds to 622 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 波斯曆中的日期開始 Hijra，對應西元 622 年西元

trans-unit.source: and is the year when Muhammad (PBUH) migrated from Mecca to Medina.
trans-unit.target: 而是從一穆罕默德 (PBUH) 移轉到麥地那的那時的年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, the date March 21, 2002 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 例如，日期 2002 年 3 月 21 日西元

trans-unit.source: corresponds to the first day of the month of Farvardeen in the year 1381 Anno Persico.
trans-unit.target: 對應至 Farvardeen 一年的月份的第一天 1381 Anno 波斯曆。

trans-unit.source: The Persian calendar is based on a solar year and is approximately 365 days long.
trans-unit.target: 波斯曆以陽曆年為基礎，而且是大約為 365 天長。

trans-unit.source: A year cycles through four seasons, and a new year begins when the sun appears to cross the equator from the southern hemisphere to the northern hemisphere as viewed from the center of the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 循環四個季節，以及新年度開始時從赤道跨越北半球檢視為從地球中心似乎太陽。

trans-unit.source: The new year marks the first day of the month of Farvardeen, which is the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere.
trans-unit.target: 新的一年標記 Farvardeen，也就是 spring 北半球中的第一天的月份的第一天。

trans-unit.source: Each of the first six months in the Persian calendar has 31 days, each of the next five months has 30 days, and the last month has 29 days in a common year and 30 days in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 每個波斯曆中的前六個月都有 31 天內、 每個未來的五個月都有 30 天，和在過去一個月有 29 天一般年份中 30 天，閏年。

trans-unit.source: A leap year is a year that, when divided by 33, has a remainder of 1, 5, 9, 13, 17, 22, 26, or 30.
For example, the year 1370 is a leap year because dividing it by 33 yields a remainder of 17.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，1370年年份為閏年，因為除以 33 會得出餘數 17。

trans-unit.source: There are approximately eight leap years in every 33-year cycle.
trans-unit.target: 每個 33 年週期有大約八個潤年。

trans-unit.source: The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the PersianCalendar class uses the Hijri solar astronomical algorithm rather than an observational algorithm to calculate dates.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 版本與 PersianCalendar 類別開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，PersianCalendar 類別會使用回教陽曆天文演算法，而不是 observational 的演算法來計算日期。

trans-unit.source: This makes the PersianCalendar implementation consistent with the Persian calendar in use in Iran and Afghanistan, the two countries in which the Persian calendar is in most widespread use.
trans-unit.target: 這會使 PersianCalendar 實作與波斯曆中的一致在伊朗和阿富汗，波斯曆最普遍使用的是兩個國家/地區中使用。

trans-unit.source: The change affects all apps running on the .NET Framework 4 or later if the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)] is installed.
trans-unit.target: 變更會影響在.NET Framework 4 或更新版本上執行的所有應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]安裝。

trans-unit.source: As a result of the changed algorithm: - The two algorithms should return identical results when converting dates between 1800 and 2123 in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 變更演算法的結果:-兩種演算法應該傳回相同的結果，將日期 2123 西曆 1800年之間轉換。

trans-unit.source: - The two algorithms may return different results when converting dates before 1800 and after 2123 in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: -將日期在 2123 西曆 1800年前後轉換兩種演算法可能會傳回不同的結果。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A> property value has changed from March 21, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar to March 22, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A>屬性值已從 March 21，0622 變更西曆為 March 22，0622年西曆。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A> property value has changed from the 10th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar to the 13th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A>屬性值已從波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月的第 10 天波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月 13 日。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A> method may return a different result than it did previously.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A>方法可能會比先前傳回不同的結果。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the PersianCalendar class Applications use a PersianCalendar object to calculate dates in the Persian calendar or convert Persian dates to and from Gregorian dates.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PersianCalendar 類別應用程式使用 PersianCalendar 物件計算波斯曆中的日期，或將波斯日期與西曆日期。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use a PersianCalendar object as the default calendar for a culture.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用 PersianCalendar 物件作為文化特性的預設曆法。

trans-unit.source: The default calendar is specified by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and must be one of the calendars returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的預設曆法<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，而且必須是所傳回的行事曆<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Currently, the PersianCalendar class is not an optional calendar for any culture supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class and consequently cannot be a default calendar.
trans-unit.target: 目前，PersianCalendar 類別不支援的任何文化特性的選擇性曆法<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>類別，因此不能是預設的行事曆。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> object that is offset the specified number of months from the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.DateTime>物件位移指定的從指定的月數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性的<xref:System.DateTime>值一律等於<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DateTime>傳回</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如下列範例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.p_7_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.p_7_1.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.globalization.p_7_1.vb)][!code-cs[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5 ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.globalization.p_7_1.cs)]

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>其中加入幾個月。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 正或負月數加入。

trans-unit.source: A object that represents the date yielded by adding the number of months specified by the months parameter to the date specified by the time parameter.
trans-unit.target: A物件，代表加入所指定的月數所產生的日期 months 參數所指定的日期 time 參數。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.DateTime>超出支援的範圍。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: months is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.
trans-unit.target: months小於-120,000 或大於 120,000。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> object that is offset the specified number of years from the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.DateTime>物件位移指定的從指定的年數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性的<xref:System.DateTime>值一律等於<xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTimeKind?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DateTime>傳回</xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性`time`藉由呼叫參數<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，如下列範例所示。</xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>要加入年。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 正數或負數年數來新增。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> object that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>天時，將指定的年數加入至指定的物件<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.DateTime>超出支援的範圍。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: years is less than -10,000 or greater than 10,000.
trans-unit.target: years小於-10,000 或大於 10,000。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前的曆法以陽曆為主、 以陰曆為主，或以陰陽曆為主。

trans-unit.source: A date calculation for a particular calendar depends on whether the calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based.
trans-unit.target: 特定曆法的日期計算取決於該曆法是以陽曆為主、 以陰曆為主，或以陰陽曆為主。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref href="System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of eras in a <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單中的紀元<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that represents the eras in a <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的紀元的整數的陣列<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The array consists of a single element having a value of <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.PersianEra"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此陣列包含的值的單一項目<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.PersianEra"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定的月份天數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 31 that represents the day of the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的月份天數的 1 到 31 的整數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time parameter represents a date less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: time 參數代表日期小於<> *> 或大於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the week in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定的一週天數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> value that represents the day of the week in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DayOfWeek>值，表示指定的一週天數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所指定之年份的日期<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 366 that represents the day of the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 366 代表指定年份的日期的整數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time parameter represents a date less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: time 參數代表日期小於<> *> 或大於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified month of the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的年份和紀元之指定月份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the month, and ranges from 1 through 12 if `year` is not 9378, or 1 through 10 if `year` is 9378.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示月份，而如果，範圍從 1 到 12`year`不是 9378，則 1 到 10 如果`year`是 9378，則。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month of the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 指定的年份和紀元之指定月份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: year, month, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: yearmonth，或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified year of the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元的指定年份中的日數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 指定的年份和紀元中的日數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days is 365 in a common year or 366 in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 天數是 365 一般年份或閏年有 366。

trans-unit.source: year or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: year或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns the era in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.PersianEra"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.PersianEra"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The time parameter represents a date less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: time 參數代表日期小於<> *> 或大於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the leap month for a specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的年份和紀元的閏月。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 表示要轉換的年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: The return value is always 0.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值永遠是 0。

trans-unit.source: year or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: year或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定的月份<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents the month in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12，表示指定的月份的整數<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The time parameter represents a date less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: time 參數代表日期小於<> *> 或大於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of months in the specified year of the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回在指定紀元的指定年份中的月數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Returns 10 if the year parameter is 9378; otherwise, always returns 12.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回 10 year 參數是 9378，否則永遠傳回 12。

trans-unit.source: year or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: year或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之年份<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime>讀取。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year in the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 表示在指定<xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime>年份的 1 到 9378 的整數

trans-unit.source: The time parameter represents a date less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: time 參數代表日期小於<> *> 或大於<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的日期是否為閏日。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 為閏日是閏年只會發生一天。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the month and ranges from 1 through 12 if `year` is not 9378, or 1 through 10 if `year` is 9378.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示月份和範圍從 1 到 12 的 if`year`不是 9378，則 1 到 10 如果`year`是 9378，則。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表天的 1 到 31 之間。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的日期為閏日。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: year, month, day, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: yearmonth， day，或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year and era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的年份和紀元中的指定的月份是否為閏月。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the month and ranges from 1 through 12 if `year` is not 9378, or 1 through 10 if `year` is 9378.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示月份和範圍從 1 到 12 的 if`year`不是 9378，則 1 到 10 如果`year`是 9378，則。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class does not support the notion of a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>因為<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別不支援閏月的概念。

trans-unit.source: year, month, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: yearmonth，或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定紀元中指定的年份是否為閏年。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar> class has changed from an observational algorithm to the Hijri solar algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，實作<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>類別已從 observational 的演算法變更為回教陽曆演算法。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the IsLeapYear method may return different values when run on [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)] than when run on previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，IsLeapYear 方法可能會傳回不同的值上執行時[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]比在舊版.NET Framework 上執行。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的年份為閏年;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: year or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: year或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得最新的日期和時間所支援<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of the MaxSupportedDateTime property is the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
trans-unit.target: MaxSupportedDateTime 屬性的值是最後一刻的年 12 月 31 日到 9999 年

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this value is equivalent to the 13th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個值相當於波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月 13 日。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it is equivalent to the 10th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，它相當於波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月的第 10 天。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions" in the <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < PersianCalendar 類別和.NET Framework 版本 > 中<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>主題。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to the year 9378 in the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 相當於波斯曆中 9378 年。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 最晚的日期和時間所支援<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得最早日期和時間所支援<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the value of the MinSupportedDateTime property is equivalent to the first moment of March 22, 622 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，MinSupportedDateTime 屬性的值相當於 March 22，指西元 622年第一個快照

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the ,NET Framework, it is equivalent to the first moment of March 21, 622 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版中，NET Framework，它相當於 March 21，指西元 622年第一個快照

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions" in the <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < PersianCalendar 類別和.NET Framework 版本 > 中<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>主題。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>
622 西元

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to the year 0001 in the Persian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 相當於波斯曆中 0001 年。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 最早日期和時間所支援<xref href="System.Globalization.PersianCalendar"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節，如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Represents the current era.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The value of PersianEra is 1.
trans-unit.target: PersianEra 的值為 1。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.DateTime> object that is set to the specified date, time, and era.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.DateTime>設為指定的日期、 時間和紀元的物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The ToDateTime method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date.
trans-unit.target: ToDateTime 方法是很有用，因為它可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換成的西曆日期。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 代表年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 從 1 到 12，表示月份的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表天的 1 到 31 之間。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 23 小時的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 59 分鐘數表示的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: 從代表第二個 0 到 59 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 999 表示毫秒的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 1 that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 從 0 到 1，表示紀元的整數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>設為指定的日期和時間目前紀元中的物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: year, month, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond, or era is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: yearmonth， day， hour， minute， second， millisecond，或era超出此曆法所支援的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year representation.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的年份轉換為四位數年份表示。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the `year` parameter to a four-digit year representation using the <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將轉換`year`參數，以使用四位數年份表示<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return value is the upper boundary of a 100-year range that allows a two-digit year to be properly translated to a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是可讓兩位數年份，即可正確地轉譯為四位數年份的 100 年範圍的上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the 100-year range is from 1930 through 2029, then a two-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930 while a two-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果 100 年範圍是從透過 2029年 1930年，然後兩位數的值 30 會解譯為 1930年而兩位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。

trans-unit.source: ToFourDigitYear supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: ToFourDigitYear 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據<xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，表示該適當世紀。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to ToFourDigitYear, the method returns the actual input value.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式提供 ToFourDigitYear 支援行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，則方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 表示要轉換的年份的 1 到 9378 的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of year.
trans-unit.target: 整數，其中包含的四位數表示 year 。

trans-unit.source: year is less than 0 or greater than 9378.
trans-unit.target: year小於 0 或大於 9378。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以 2 位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

trans-unit.source: This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 2029年，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自中控制台中的 地區及語言選項的設定。

trans-unit.source: However, that information can change during the life of the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，該資訊可以變更<xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>的存留期間

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar> class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。</xref:System.Globalization.PersianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: If the calendar is not supported in the regional and language options, the initial value of this property is the default value defined by the calendar class.
trans-unit.target: 如果地區及語言選項不支援行事曆，這個屬性的初始值。 曆法類別所定義的預設值

trans-unit.source: The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應將此值為 99，表示就其字面 2 位數的年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99.
trans-unit.target: 例如，這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.
trans-unit.target: 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 以 2 位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

trans-unit.source: This calendar is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此行事曆處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value in a set operation is less than 100 or greater than 9378.
trans-unit.target: 設定作業中的值是小於 100 或大於 9378。
